app_story: Describe only: what the app does, the minimal entities involved (if any), and that data persists locally (if applicable).

entry_point: Must include: program name and how to run it (e.g., python main.py).

hard_prohibitions: No markdown fences or code blocks.
No class names, module names, method/function signatures.
No advanced features (auth, sync, plugins, UI, multi-user) unless explicitly required by the task description.
No CLI argument parsing complexity (flags, options, subcommands) unless explicitly required.
example_handling_rules: Any examples provided in context are FORMAT EXAMPLES ONLY.

If an example conflicts with the current TASK DESCRIPTION, the TASK DESCRIPTION always wins.
